Projects

  • 2022.03 - Pres.
    ASM (American Society for Metals) Materials Camps
    I lead electron microscopy module at the yearly ASM camp to encourage high school students to take up STEM fields. I demonstrate Electron microscopy and other topics in materials science and engineering.
    • Electron microscopy
  • 2017.03 - 2017.05
    Improving Solid State Synthesis Yield
    I led Vanadium Oxide preparation project in a group of four, tailored heat treatment strategies, and improved synthesis yield from 20% to over 80%. We reduced the study time from a semester to just three weeks by careful resource management and actively inducing data feedback.
    • Solid State
  • 2017.03 - 2017.03
    Thin-film Characterization
    I carried out literature survey on XRD, Raman Spectroscopy, and surface profilometry to identify given thin-films.
    • XRD
    • Raman Spectroscopy
  • 2015.05 - 2015.09
    Student Satellite Project
    I delegated survey tasks to 8 interns at the Dept of Electronics, IIT Guwahati and identified essential elements for building microsatellites. I also held pertinent presentations (online) for 5 regional colleges, instructing nearly 300 students and teachers.
    • Microsatellites
